title: cultural_data_Museum_Barberini
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.barberini.museum.barberinidigital.
Application Name: Museum Barberini.
Number of Reviews: 1820.00.
Application Description: Experience art digitally - before, during and after the visit. Before you visit the Museum Barberini, you can use the Barberini app to find out more about exhibitions or you can explore the museum in 360 ° panoramas that promise multimedia content. If you want to avoid waiting at the cash desk, buy your tickets in the app. Listen to exciting audio tours during your visit and intuitively navigate around the house with your smartphone. Favorite exhibits can be saved in a favorites list. After the visit you have the opportunity to listen to this content. In the archive of the app you will also find works and audio tours of past exhibitions.Features:• Audio tours for children and adults• Indoor navigation and location-based content• Information about current and upcoming exhibitions• 360° panoramas with multimedia content• Tours archive• Biographies• Integrated ticketing• Videos about artists and curators• Opening times, offers, prices, location• Information about the history of the building, the art and the founder• newsletter subscription.
Number of Characters in Description: 1052.00.
Overall Rate: 4.70.
First Page Reviews: Audioguides are always made so, that they are interesting both for children and grownups. What's uncomfortable about the app is that there is no option of choosing the language inside the app, you have to switch your phone's language settings. Excellent complement to the exhibition. I can't change the language in the app. I don't want it oversetted into English, want the original. Does what it's supposed to do.
Number of Characters in First Page Reviews: 413.00.
Last Update: 09/06/2018.
Ending Date: 19/03/2021.

App Size: 58.00.

 Version Required: 5.00.
